wn past

r firepower wins battles, superior intellect wins wars."

tep forward was a female, tall and slender, she radiated a

ce is almost achingly beautiful to behold.  "I am

she took her place behind the first. "Your

ice."

ep

ves hint at his aerial alt-mode. He moved to stand to the other side

eepstryke. "I am NIGHTRAZOR." His voice was quiet, understated and

s his optics focused on Cyclonus. "Don't fear what you cannot

hat do not expect."

perhaps as tall as

nd a nosecone

 music is death in your ears!"

onus continued to frown, unsure if his point was taken.
